text: The Nintendo Switch 2 is an upcoming video game console developed by Nintendo. It was revealed on 16 January 2025. It will support Nintendo Switch games. The console will release on 5 June 2025. == Games == Some of the games that will be able to be played on the Nintendo Switch 2: * Mario Kart World * Donkey Kong Bananza * Drag X Drive * Fortnite * The Duskbloods * Kirby Air Riders * Project 007 * Street Fighter 6 ==Notes== ==References== == Other websites == * Official website Category:Nintendo video game consoles Category:Handheld game consoles
title: Nintendo Switch 2
